name: Supermarket Customer Analysis
desc: Analyze supermarket customer data to boost marketing, sales, and product bundling by understanding preferences and demographics.

name: Cohort Retention Analysis
desc: Cosmetics e-commerce platforms face cart abandonment due to pricing, brand loyalty, and other factors, impacting customer retention.

name: Retail Store RFM Analysis
desc: A retail store aims to analyze customer patterns, value, and characteristics to improve engagement strategies.

name: Time Series Forecasting : TOWR
desc: Analyzing TOWR's historical stock prices helps identify trends, volatility, and predict future movements for strategic decision-making.

name: Sentiment Analysis Text Mining
desc: The Free Nutritious Food Program faces challenges in gauging public perception due to unstructured social media and news data.

name: Bank Marketing Campaign
desc: This project analyzes Bank Sigma's term deposit campaign using historical data to identify customer traits linked to higher participation.

name: Mobile App Design Furniture Shop
desc: Furniture shopping app with login, product listings, detailed views, cart, and payment options for a smooth user experience.
